summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1286, for the improvement of 21st Avenue from Yesler Way to East Jefferson Street; in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants, and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 13978 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
